metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0048 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
OpenTTD 0.3.5 through 1.1.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (game pause) by connecting to the server and not finishing the (1) authorization phase or (2) map download, aka a "slow read" attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openttd - 1.2.1-1
openttd-data - 1.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openttd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
